description: This table contains hospital account value codes information from the Hospital Account Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column stores the line number in the results of a query. Because multiple value codes can be stored in one hospital account, each value code will have a unique line number.

columns.name: VALUE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
A value code stored in the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: VALUE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The monetary amount associated with a value code stored in the hospital account.
